sn47.36:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.36:1.6: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.36:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham—
sn47.36:1.9: dittheva dhamme anna, sati va upadisese anagamita”ti.
